Differential Equations | Series Solutions Example 3

\begin{array}{c}\n\left(1+2 x+3 x^{2}\right) y^{\prime \prime}+(1+4 x) y^{\prime}+y=0 \\\n\qquad y=2 \quad a_{1 n} x^{1 n} \\\nn=0\n\end{array}[imath]\left(1+2 x+3 x^{2}\right) y^{\prime \prime}+(1+4 x) y^{\prime}+y=0 [/imath] [imath]\qquad y=2 \quad a_{1 n} x^{1 n} [/imath] [imath]n=0[/imath]
